g.title: public.node_tags
g.text: Join table connecting nodes to tags (many-to-many)
ID of the node being tagged
ID of the tag being applied

g.title: public.nodes
g.text: Core memory storage for conversation messages and context
Number of times this node has been accessed/retrieved
SHA-256 hash of content for deduplication
Soft delete timestamp - node is considered deleted when set
Vector embedding (max 2000 dimensions) for semantic search
Actual number of dimensions used in the embedding vector (max 2000)
When this memory was last accessed
Reference to source file (for file-loaded nodes)
Number of tokens in the content (for context budget management)
When this memory was last modified

g.title: public.node_tags:node_id->public.nodes:id
g.text: FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES nodes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

g.title: public.tags
g.text: Hierarchical tag in format: root:level1:level2 (e.g., database:postgresql:timescaledb)

g.title: public.node_tags:tag_id->public.tags:id
g.text: FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

g.title: public.file_sources
g.text: Source file metadata for loaded documents
When file was last synced to HTM

g.title: public.nodes:source_id->public.file_sources:id
g.text: FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES file_sources(id) ON DELETE SET NULL

g.title: public.robot_nodes
g.text: Join table connecting robots to nodes (many-to-many)
When this robot first remembered this content
When this robot last tried to remember this content
ID of the node being remembered
Number of times this robot has tried to remember this content
ID of the robot that remembered this node

g.title: public.robot_nodes:node_id->public.nodes:id
g.text: FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES nodes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

g.title: public.working_memories
g.text: When node was added to working memory
Robot whose working memory this belongs to
Cached token count for budget tracking

g.title: public.working_memories:node_id->public.nodes:id
g.text: FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES nodes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
